thread.section_title: 1st Formations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1st Formations | www.1stformations.co.uk | 3 of 141
thread.title: Emma Hardern

author: Emma Hardern
title: Emma Hardern
text:
I was quite dubious about using an online company when I wanted to go Ltd and vat registered, but I checked their reviews and gave it a go.
They've been superb. Fast, efficient, and my accountant was slightly horrified at how cost effective it's been, she'd have charged me 3 times as much and taken 3 times as long.
My only regret is not buying my phone number from them, I chose a different company and they've been useless
